channel.title: Comments on: Kuri’s Crew: Meet Jackie Lai
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Arturo! You can pre-order Kuri today for $799 (the price goes up to $899 starting March 1st!). Kuri does not require batteries. She uses a dock to charge herself, and it can be plugged into any standard power outlet in your home. Please check out our FAQ page for more information: /FAQs
item.content:encoded: Hi Arturo! You can pre-order Kuri today for $799 (the price goes up to $899 starting March 1st!). Kuri does not require batteries. She uses a dock to charge herself, and it can be plugged into any standard power outlet in your home. Please check out our FAQ page for more information: /FAQs

item.title: By: Arturo Nava

item.description: What is the total cost? Does it need batteries?
item.content:encoded: What is the total cost? Does it need batteries?

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Joanne! Please email our Kuri Experience team at support@heykuri.com regarding specific order send dates. Thanks!
